channel.title: Comments on: Back from the Dead
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: It seems like too much of a coincidence that the computer would have the same problem with both the original UPS and the replacement UPS. Someone suggested that there might be an issue with the power supply.
item.content:encoded: It seems like too much of a coincidence that the computer would have the same problem with both the original UPS and the replacement UPS. Someone suggested that there might be an issue with the power supply.

item.title: By: Echo
item.dc:creator: Echo
item.description: Err. That makes it sound like there might be something weird with your UPS.
item.content:encoded: Err. That makes it sound like there might be something weird with your UPS.
